fields.comment: Distance from entity position where interaction is possible
fields.name: radius

fields.comment: key or string for the text to display
fields.name: ui_text

fields.comment: this name is called to the on_interacted function on LuaComponents
fields.name: name

fields.comment: If > 0, only 1 instance of this interaction can be display at the same time
fields.name: exclusivity_group
